actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the period for which pension distributions made in connection with the sale of a subsidiary corporation are eligible for rollover treatment.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the period (by two years after the date on which the Secretary issues a determination letter) for which pension distributions made in connection with the sale of a subsidiary corporation are eligible for rollover treatment.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the period for which pension distributions made in connection with the sale of a subsidiary corporation are eligible for rollover treatment.
